intro: With the emperor suddenly falling ill, the battle for succession begins. Build your deck and lead your favored princess to the throne!
description:
Support your chosen princess.
The legendary deck-building game of royal succession is back!

Expand your territory, earn the backing of influential figures, and seize victory in the battle for the throne!

Heart of Crown Online is the Digital Adaptation of the beloved deck-building card game, Heart of Crown.

■Game Overview
Compete to enthrone your princess before anyone else in this 4-player, turn-based deck-building card game.
Use the wealth generated from your territories to purchase new lands and powerful action cards that will help you gain the advantage!

Once your preparations are complete, it's time to back your princess! 
Each princess comes with her own powerful abilities and since only one player can support each princess, you'll have to make your move quickly!

Recruit influential figures such as, Senators and Noble Dukes, and once your Succession Score reaches 20, it's coronation time and the throne and victory are yours!

Online cross-play is supported, with both ranked and custom matches available!

A fully voiced Story Mode is also included, offering a complete single-player experience in addition to multiplayer battles.

■Story
In an age where swords and sorcery still ruled the world, a mighty empire unified the continent and ended generations of conflicted. 
However, before long-lasting peace could set in, the great emperor fell ill and passed away without naming a successor.

Chaos begins to swell... As one of the empire's leading influential figures and it falls onto you to secure the throne and preserve peace across the land.
The emperor left no sons, but seven promising candidates remain, led by his two direct-bloodline princesses.

Choose the princess you support, rally your forces, and lead her to the imperial throne!

■ Voice Cast
Lulunasaika: Kaori Nazuka
Bergamotte: Atsuki Nakamura
Flammaria: Seiko Yoshida
Ohka: Ayaka Fujimoto
Laolily: Natsumi Haruse
Klam-Klam: Non Harusaki
Lain: Reina Kawamura
Shion: Nao Ojika
